newMessage:
**Functional Purpose**: Alert message for new discussion posts
**UI Location**: Mentoring session → Discussion tab (top of the discussion panel)
**When Users See This**: When there are new messages in the discussion that the user hasn't seen yet
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "New Message"
favoriteStep.addStudentToFavorites:
**Functional Purpose**: Asks the mentor if they want to add a student to their favorites.
**UI Location**: Mentoring session → Discussion (finished wizard, Favorite step)
**When Users See This**: After completing a mentoring session, during the post-session wizard.
**Technical Context**: `studentHandle` variable must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Add %{studentHandle} to your favorites?"
favoriteStep.addToFavorites:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to add the student to favorites.
**UI Location**: Mentoring session → Discussion (finished wizard, Favorite step)
**When Users See This**: After completing a mentoring session, during the post-session wizard.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Add to favorites"
favoriteStep.skip:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to skip adding the student to favorites.
**UI Location**: Mentoring session → Discussion (finished wizard, Favorite step)
**When Users See This**: After completing a mentoring session, during the post-session wizard.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Skip"
